data.title: Eddie Albert Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Eddie Albert on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Eddie Albert including The Longest Day, Oklahoma!, and more.
data.text:
Dead Weight

No body, no weapon and an unstable murder witness complicate Columbo's case against America's leading war hero. Eddie Albert and Suzanne Pleshette guest star.

The Body Politic

Jessica moonlights as campaign speech writer for her friend Kathleen Lane, only to become involved in clearing Kathleen of the murder charge in her campaign manager's death which has devastating effects on her political career.

Jonathan Winters

The brilliant Jonathan Winters guests as a pair of airport patrons interviewed by Harvey. And in "Carol & Sis", Carol and Harvey struggle to remember the names of their visiting old dear friends.

Pilot

Hollywood stuntman Colt Seavers hatches an elaborate plan to nab a corrupt sheriff, and he runs into trouble trying to protect an old friend.
